text: Walter Percy Chrysler (April 2, 1875 – August 18, 1940) was an American businessman. He was the executive and the founder and namesake of American Chrysler Corporation. ==Other websites== * Photo of the Bendel Estate at Kings Point * "The Man Who Bet His Dreams", Popular Mechanics, August 1932, pp. 194–198 Category:1875 births Category:1940 deaths Category:Deaths from cerebral hemorrhage Category:Businesspeople from Kansas Category:American chief executives Category:Time People of the Year
title: Walter Chrysler
